title: Starboard Urges Bitcoin Miner Riot to Speed Up Shift to Data Centers
description: Activist investor Starboard Value is asking Riot Platforms Inc. to speed up its transition from Bitcoin miner to a data center company that could house hyperscaler tenants, according to a letter reviewed by Bloomberg News.

title: Western Digital to Raise $3.09 Billion in Sandisk Share Sale
description: Western Digital Corp. is seeking to raise $3.09 billion from the sale of a stake in Sandisk Corp., the flash-memory unit that it spun off nearly a full year ago.

title: ‘Predator’ Spyware Used to Hack iPhone of Journalist in Angola
description: A prominent journalist in Angola was targeted by a government-grade spyware in the first known case of its kind in the southern African nation, researchers have found.
